statements: SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT first_name, last_name, gender FROM patients WHERE gender='Male';
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM patients WHERE last_name='Smith';
SELECT patient_id, first_name, last_name, date_of_birth FROM patients ORDER BY date_of_birth DESC;
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE contact_number IS NOT NULL AND email IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM patients ORDER BY last_name ASC, first_name ASC;
SELECT first_name, last_name, date_of_birth FROM patients WHERE gender='Male';
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE date_of_birth < '1990-01-01';
SELECT patient_id, first_name, last_name, email FROM patients WHERE address LIKE '%Street%';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_patients FROM patients;
SELECT * FROM patient_personal_info;
SELECT first_name, last_name, date_of_birth FROM patient_personal_info WHERE patient_id = 1;
SELECT last_name, address FROM patient_personal_info WHERE patient_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM patient_medical_history;
SELECT blood_type, diagnosis, last_visit_date FROM patient_medical_history WHERE patient_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM patient_personal_info WHERE patient_id = 123;
SELECT first_name, last_name, address FROM patient_personal_info WHERE date_of_birth > '1980-01-01';
SELECT first_name, last_name, address FROM patient_personal_info JOIN patient_medical_history ON patient_personal_info.patient_id = patient_medical_history.patient_id WHERE blood_type = 'AB+';

SELECT patient_id, first_name, last_visit_date, diagnosis FROM patient_personal_info JOIN patient_medical_history ON patient_personal_info.patient_id = patient_medical_history.patient_id WHERE last_visit_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_patients FROM patient_personal_info;
SELECT * FROM patient_personal_information;
SELECT first_name, last_name, date_of_birth FROM patient_personal_information ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT diagnosis FROM medical_history WHERE date_of_diagnosis > '2020-01-01';
SELECT patient_id, treatment_name FROM medical_history JOIN treatment_data ON medical_history.treatment_id = treatment_data.treatment_id;
SELECT first_name, last_name, gender FROM patient_personal_information WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT * FROM patient_personal_information WHERE gender='Female' ORDER BY last_name DESC, first_name ASC
SELECT first_name, last_name, date_of_birth FROM patient_personal_information WHERE date_of_birth >= '1990-01-01'

SELECT p.first_name, p.last_name, m.diagnosis, m.date_of_diagnosis, t.treatment_name FROM patient_personal_information p JOIN medical_history m ON p.patient_id = m.patient_id JOIN treatment_data t ON m.treatment_id = t.treatment_id WHERE t.dosage > 50

SELECT p.first_name, p.last_name, m.diagnosis, m.date_of_diagnosis, t.treatment_name FROM patient_personal_information p LEFT JOIN medical_history m ON p.patient_id = m.patient_id LEFT JOIN treatment_data t ON m.treatment_id = t.treatment_id WHERE m.date_of_diagnosis >= '2020-01-01'

SELECT p.first_name AS patient_first_name, p.last_name AS patient_last_name, m.diagnosis, m.date_of_diagnosis, t.treatment_name, t.dosage FROM patient_personal_information p JOIN medical_history m ON p.patient_id = m.patient_id JOIN treatment_data t ON m.treatment_id = t.treatment_id ORDER BY m.date_of_diagnosis ASC,t.dosage DESC
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT full_name, gender FROM Patients ORDER BY full_name DESC;
SELECT patient_id, full_name, date_of_birth, address FROM Patients WHERE gender='Male';
SELECT record_id, patient_id, diagnosis FROM MedicalHistory WHERE diagnosis LIKE '%flu%';
SELECT model_id, model_name, accuracy FROM PredictiveModeling ORDER BY accuracy DESC;
SELECT * FROM Patients WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT full_name, date_of_birth FROM Patients ORDER BY date_of_birth DESC;

SELECT Patients.full_name, MedicalHistory.diagnosis, TreatmentData.treatment FROM Patients JOIN MedicalHistory ON Patients.patient_id = MedicalHistory.patient_id JOIN TreatmentData ON MedicalHistory.record_id = TreatmentData.record_id WHERE TreatmentData.treatment_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT model_name, AVG(accuracy) AS average_accuracy FROM PredictiveModeling GROUP BY model_name HAVING AVG(accuracy) > 80;
SELECT full_name, address FROM Patients WHERE full_name LIKE 'J%';
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth, address FROM Patients WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT physician_name, specialty, hospital_name FROM Physicians ORDER BY specialty DESC;
SELECT diagnosis, admission_date, discharge_date FROM MedicalHistory WHERE diagnosis LIKE '%flu%';
SELECT model_name, prediction_result, prediction_date FROM PredictiveModels ORDER BY prediction_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Patients WHERE patient_id = 1;
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth FROM Patients WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT physician_name, specialty, hospital_name FROM Physicians ORDER BY specialty DESC;
SELECT treatment_name, treatment_date FROM Treatments WHERE patient_id = 3 AND treatment_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT patient_name, diagnosis, admission_date, discharge_date FROM Patients JOIN MedicalHistory ON Patients.patient_id = MedicalHistory.patient_id WHERE Patients.gender = 'Male';
